price: Aho rero, uraca witegurira kurengutswa n’Imana Allah, uheze uninahaze ushimagize Imana yawe Rurema Allah, wongere uyisabe kenshi ikigongwe. Mu vy’ukuri, Yo Yamye Yumvira cane abigaya.
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wa-is'taghfir'hu innahu kāna tawwāban
